product_name: Therm-a-Rest ProLite Sleeping Pad - Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Engineered for alpine climbing, adventure racing and long-distance backpacking, this ultralight pad uses advanced materials and a tapered shape so you can go fast, go far and stay warm.
short_description: Engineered for alpine climbing, adventure racing and long-distance backpacking, this ultralight pad uses advanced materials and a tapered shape so you can go fast, go far and stay warm.
